header.title: Photos from Beitostølen - The Royal House of Norway

body.p: Their Royal Highnesses The Crown Prince and Crown Princess, Princess Ingrid Alexandra and Prince Sverre Magnus met the press for a family photo shoot at Beitsostølen today.
The weather was marvellous at Beitostølen this afternoon. The family went skiing and sledging, and enjoyed a little rest with grilled marshmallows.
More pictures can be found in the photo albums via the link to the right.
